title: InitialPosition
description:
description: |
  Initial start position of the bot used for debugging as a comma-separated format taking the x and y coordinates
  and starting angle/heading.

x.description: The x coordinate. When it is not set, a random value will be used.

y.description: The y coordinate. When it is not set, a random value will be used.

angle.description: The angle. When it is not set, a random value will be used.
